description:
Troy is Portuguese but he's never been to Portugal.
"You're Portuguese but you must get it a lot that you're something else, huh?"
"I always get the 'Uh, you look exotic... Are you, uh... Are you Persian? Middle Eastern? Brazilian?'" Troy said. "I get it all!"
"Mexican?"
"Mexican."
"Puerto Rican?"
"Puerto Rican."
"Are you proud to be Portuguese?"
"I am," he replied. "You know actually, as a kid... I actually, I was a little embarrassed. I don't know why. 'Cause I don't think really too many people knew about Portuguese. So... kinda weird as a little kid I was kinda embarrassed but now I'm totally prideful of being Portuguese. I love it."
Well, Troy definitely has a very sexy look. Handsome face, tall, lean body, hairy chest, and nice dick and balls!
title: Troy
